remarks: Property of the additive inverse endomorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-2013.)
statement:
tendoicl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendoicl.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoicl.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoicl.i $e |- I = ( s e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> `' ( s ` f ) ) ) $.
tendoi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
tendoi.p $e |- P = ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> ( ( s ` f ) o. ( t ` f ) ) ) ) $.
tendoi.o $e |- O = ( f e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) $.
tendoipl $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ S e. E ) -> ( ( I ` S ) P S ) = O ) $.
$d B f $.
$d E s $.
$d E s t $.
$d H f $.
$d K f $.
$d T f s $.
$d T f s t $.
